plot outline: The cinematographic idea of the film is 'PHOBIA' and 'VIGOR' in a contemporary Indian metropolis like Kolkata. This city and its people are reeling under the contradiction of rapid global developments and innate prejudices of the 'old world.'
title: Mahanagar@Kolkata
plot: The cinematographic idea of the film is 'PHOBIA' and 'VIGOR' in a contemporary Indian metropolis like Kolkata. This city and its people are reeling under the contradiction of rapid global developments and innate prejudices of the 'old world.'::SM
